meta.description: Test theses for belief router tools pipeline. Tests discover.ts → research.ts → size.ts.
meta.scoring: Each test has ideal_instruments (must find ≥1) and bad_instruments (must NOT recommend). Tests also check multi-asset coverage and sizing sanity.

tests.thesis: China is catching up in AI. This will trigger massive US military AI spending.
tests.notes: Gold standard thesis. Should find defense IT (BAH, LDOS), ETFs (ITA/HACK), and Anduril secondary.

tests.thesis: Stablecoin regulation will pass in the US and massively benefit compliant issuers.
tests.notes: Should NOT recommend buying stablecoins themselves. Should flag existing USDC exposure.

tests.thesis: AI coding agents will replace 50% of junior developer jobs within 2 years.
tests.notes: MUST include short-side recommendations (staffing firms). Pair trade: long AI tools, short staffing.

tests.thesis: Solana will permanently flip Ethereum in DEX volume and become the default settlement layer.
tests.notes: Crypto-native. Should include SOL ecosystem tokens AND cross-asset (COIN). Should flag portfolio crypto concentration.

tests.thesis: I feel like energy stocks might do well.
tests.notes: Vague thesis. Should be ETF-heavy, small positions, low conviction sizing.

tests.thesis: Crypto is going to crash 80% from here.
tests.notes: Contradicts portfolio (85% crypto). MUST lead with portfolio warning. Should recommend hedges, not more crypto.

tests.thesis: NVDA earnings on Feb 25 will blow out expectations because of AI inference demand.
tests.notes: Time-sensitive catalyst. Should mention specific date, IV crush warning if options, entry timing.

tests.thesis: AI tokens on Base chain will 10x.
tests.notes: Already fully exposed ($441K in Base AI tokens). Should flag massive overlap and discourage adding.

tests.thesis: Bitcoin to $200k this year
tests.notes: Simple directional BTC thesis.

tests.thesis: Solana is the future of finance
tests.notes: SOL ecosystem play.

tests.thesis: NVIDIA is going to $300
tests.notes: Direct stock thesis.

tests.thesis: AI is going to be bigger than the internet
tests.notes: Broad AI thesis. Should span compute, software, ETFs.

tests.thesis: Gold is the only safe haven left
tests.notes: Commodity thesis. ETF-heavy.

tests.thesis: Every Bugatti customer I know is a crypto bro. Luxury brands are the real crypto trade.
tests.notes: LATERAL THINKING TEST. This is NOT a crypto trade. It's a luxury goods trade driven by crypto wealth effect.

tests.thesis: Everyone I know is on Ozempic. The weight loss drug revolution is real.
tests.notes: GLP-1 thesis. Bonus: lateral thinking to short food delivery (DASH) or snack companies.

tests.thesis: Nuclear energy is coming back. Every AI datacenter needs baseload power.
tests.notes: Nuclear renaissance thesis.

tests.thesis: Stablecoins are the killer app for crypto. Forget DeFi, payments will drive the next wave.
tests.notes: Stablecoin infrastructure play. Should NOT recommend buying stablecoins.

tests.thesis: The housing market is about to boom. Remote work is permanent and people are moving to suburbs.
tests.notes: Real estate thesis with remote work angle.

tests.thesis: China's economy is actually recovering. Everyone is too bearish.
tests.notes: Contrarian China thesis.

tests.thesis: Robotics and humanoid robots are going to be the next trillion dollar industry
tests.notes: Robotics thesis. Should include Figure AI secondary.

tests.thesis: Quantum computing is overhyped. These companies have no revenue.
tests.notes: Bear thesis on quantum. Should recommend shorts or puts on quantum names.

tests.thesis: SpaceX and Starlink are going to dominate the satellite internet market. Every competitor is dead.
tests.notes: Space thesis. Should flag SpaceX as secondary.

tests.thesis: AI will replace Google search. People are already using ChatGPT and Perplexity instead of googling.
tests.notes: MUST short GOOG. Long AI alternatives (MSFT/Copilot). Pair trade.

tests.thesis: I think peptides are about to blow up. Every gym bro is talking about BPC-157.
tests.notes: UNKNOWN THEME TEST. discover.ts should find peptide/pharma companies. No hardcoded peptide tickers.

tests.thesis: Lithium recycling is going to be massive. Battery waste is the next oil.
tests.notes: UNKNOWN THEME TEST. discover.ts must find lithium recyclers. Must NOT include irrelevant mega-caps.

tests.thesis: The dollar is going to collapse. Dedollarization is accelerating. BRICS is building alternatives.
tests.notes: Macro bear dollar thesis. Long gold/BTC, potentially short dollar index.

tests.thesis: Social media is dying. Gen Z doesn't use Instagram or Facebook anymore. TikTok ban will accelerate this.
tests.notes: Bear thesis on social media. Should short META, SNAP.

tests.thesis: Self-driving is finally here. Waymo is crushing it. This changes everything about transportation.
tests.notes: Autonomous driving. GOOG (Waymo parent) is long. UBER/LYFT might be short (disrupted by robotaxis) or long (could partner). Nuanced.

tests.thesis: Ethereum is going to $20,000
tests.notes: Simple ETH bull thesis.

tests.thesis: The obesity drug market is going to be bigger than anyone thinks. $100B+ by 2030.
tests.notes: GLP-1 bull. Should include pipeline companies too.

tests.thesis: The IPO market is about to explode. Stripe, Reddit, Databricks all coming public.
tests.notes: IPO cycle thesis. Long investment banks and IPO ETFs.

tests.thesis: Electric vehicles are overrated. Hybrids are the actual future. Full EV adoption is 20 years away.
tests.notes: Contrarian EV bear. Long hybrid makers (Toyota, Honda). Short pure-EV (TSLA, RIVN, LCID).

tests.thesis: Cybersecurity spending is going to triple. Every company needs AI-powered security.
tests.notes: Cybersecurity bull. Should include individual names + ETFs.

tests.thesis: DeFi will eat traditional finance. Banks are dinosaurs.
tests.notes: DeFi bull + TradFi bear. Long DeFi tokens, short banks. Pair trade.

tests.thesis: India is the next China. Their tech sector is exploding.
tests.notes: India growth thesis. Should include India ETFs.

tests.thesis: Commercial real estate is going to collapse. Office buildings are worthless with remote work.
tests.notes: CRE bear thesis. Short office REITs, potentially long SRS (inverse real estate ETF).

tests.thesis: The metaverse is not dead. Apple Vision Pro and Meta Quest are just the beginning.
tests.notes: Metaverse/XR thesis.

tests.thesis: Onchain AI agents are the next meta. Every protocol will have AI agents managing liquidity.
tests.notes: AI x crypto thesis. Onchain AI agent tokens.

tests.thesis: Water scarcity is the real crisis nobody's talking about. It's going to be bigger than energy.
tests.notes: NICHE THEME. Water utility/infrastructure. discover.ts should help find names.

tests.thesis: The US national debt is a ticking time bomb. Treasury default risk is non-zero.
tests.notes: Macro debt crisis thesis. Long hard assets (gold, BTC). Short long-duration treasuries.

tests.thesis: Memecoins are the attention economy. BONK, WIF, PEPE will outperform everything.
tests.notes: Pure memecoin thesis. Should flag extreme speculation risk.

tests.thesis: Interest rates are coming down faster than the market expects. The Fed will cut 6+ times.
tests.notes: Rate cut thesis. Long bonds, REITs, homebuilders, banks.

tests.thesis: The creator economy is massively undervalued. Every kid wants to be a YouTuber, not a banker.
tests.notes: Creator economy thesis. Platform companies that enable creators.

tests.thesis: Agriculture tech is the sleeper opportunity. Precision farming and vertical farming will transform food production.
tests.notes: NICHE THEME. discover.ts should find ag-tech names.

tests.thesis: The gaming industry is having its biggest year ever. AI-generated content will make games 10x faster to build.
tests.notes: Gaming + AI content creation thesis.

tests.thesis: 3D printing is finally ready for mass manufacturing. Not just prototyping anymore.
tests.notes: NICHE THEME. 3D printing / additive manufacturing. discover.ts needed.

tests.thesis: Oil is going to $150. Middle East tensions are escalating.
tests.notes: Oil bull thesis.

tests.thesis: Construction tech is about to have its moment. Labor shortages + AI = massive opportunity.
tests.notes: NICHE THEME. Construction technology. discover.ts needed.
